sentences.english: The fracture of the tie bolts of the D39 main engine has been analysed briefly.
sentences.chinese: 对D39主机底脚螺栓断裂事故进行了简略的分析。

sentences.english: 2354 – An accident in one of the artificial Sun leads to drought.
sentences.chinese: 2354年，人造太阳出现事故，导致干旱。

sentences.english: They might be,for example,in an accident, and come close to being killed,but walk away without a scratch.
sentences.chinese: 比如说在事故中幸存，差点送命，但结果毫发无伤。

sentences.english: Results Food-poisoning accidents happen more frequently in the third quarter.
sentences.chinese: 结果食物中毒事故第三季度高发。

sentences.english: His denial that he had witnessed the accident dumbfounded me.
sentences.chinese: 他否认曾亲眼目睹这一事故的发生把我惊呆了。

sentences.english: Perak, Malaysia is currently the police are stepping into the cause.
sentences.chinese: 目前马来西亚霹雳州警方正在加紧调查事故的原因。

sentences.english: It was because of the train accident that the bus was so crowded.
sentences.chinese: 正是由于火车发惹事故，雄共汽车才会这么多人。

sentences.english: The incident took place at one of Beijing's most well-known shopping areas.
sentences.chinese: 此次事故发生在北京一个最著名的商业区。

sentences.english: The accident took place at a power plant in Fengcheng where a cooling tower was under construction.
sentences.chinese: 事故发生在江西丰城一处电厂，正在修建一座冷却塔。

sentences.english: In real life there has been just one fatal space depressurisation accident.
sentences.chinese: 在现实生活中只有一起致命的太空爆发性减压事故。
事故发生后，一个后轮发生了爆胎。

sentences.english: His mine collapsed in an accident.
sentences.chinese: 但他的矿井再一次事故中倒塌。

sentences.english: The accident blocked all traffic at the rotary.
sentences.chinese: 事故造成了三叉路口的交通堵塞。

sentences.english: In the accident, the workers received a heavy dose of radiation.
sentences.chinese: 工人在事故中受到严重幅射。

sentences.english: Always pay attention to safety, prevent accidents everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 时时注意安全，处处预防事故。

sentences.english: The findings contradict statements made by Halliburton in the weeks following the accident.
sentences.chinese: 该发现反驳了哈里伯顿在事故发生后一周的说法。

definition: to tailgate/to hit the car in front as a result of tailgating
to cause an accident/to be responsible for an incident/to provoke a disturbance
collision/crash/to crash together/to collide with/to bump into
to scrape one's car against sth/to sideswipe
to catch fire/to cook/to get angry
to sustain injuries/wounded (in an accident etc)/harmed
